item.title: Saliotthomas add a quote by amin maalouf
item.description: "I am the son of the road , my country is a caravan and my life is the most unexpected of voyages. i belong to earth and to the god and it is to them that I will one day soon return" -- amin maalouf

item.title: Saliotthomas add a quote by Andrei Makine
item.description: "People speak because they are afraid of silence. They speak mechanically whether aloud or to themselves. They are intoxicated by this vocal gruel that ensnares every object and every being. They talk about rain and fine weather; they talk about money, about love, about nothing. And even when they are talking about their most exalted love, they use words uttered a hundred times, threadbare phrases." -- Andrei Makine
